Banner.Description: I have 1.5 years of experience developing systems, interfaces, websites, and technological solutions to make the web a better place. I am dedicated to writing and refactoring clean, reusable, and scalable code in Angular and React applying good practices and development standards.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: In my 1.5 years as a developer, I seek to train every day. I have worked writing unit tests, performing continuous integration. I have led teams having empathy, exercising motivation to partners, and setting plans and goals together.
My skills also include implementing system improvements, optimizing sites, standardizing patterns, and suggesting and executing ideas that add value to the project I'm working on.
Some of the technologies that I have trained and worked on include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Product Developer
Description: Ensured a seamless user experience by resolving style issues and implementing a responsive design for all screen sizes

Enhanced application performance by approximately 30% through code refactoring, redundancy removal,reduced unnecessary component re-renders, and the implementation of unit test cases to proactively mitigate potential bugs.
Produced stunning visual elements and re-usable components of the app by translating UI/UX design into code using HTML, CSS, Typescript and Angular
Implementation of lazy loading concept improved front-end performance by 15% and documented application changes & worked on updates.
Implemented smart polling concept which gave real-time transaction updates to the users

Experience.Jobs.Title: Frontend developer intern
Description: Developed and maintained web applications using React.
Coding of API requests with RxJS.
Creation of modules with complex reactive forms
Improved website performance by optimizing images and implementing caching techniques.
Collaborated with designers and back-end developers to create responsive and user-friendly web experiences

FeatureProjects.Title: Projects that I was a part of
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: WIDO TV
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Wido is a video application that allows you to watch local content exclusively from your phone or tablet with a user-friendly interface, the app offers a smooth browsing experience whether you're connected to a Wi-Fi network or using 3G/4G.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: DIGITAL MARKETPLACE
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: This is a project to design and build a full Commerce website and management system for customers and product management team. Customers can view the product lists at the home page, go to the detail pages, add products to their carts and log in to the customer page. Management team can add or edit products information (pictures, prices, brand and so on) on the webpage

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Needle
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Needle Music is a pioneer in the digital music industry as it allows users to create and manage their first and only Audiobiography. It built with the Spotify SDK Integration.

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I will be happy to receive your contact if you want to talk about new opportunities. Write me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message. Simple one-page design that features a profile letter with basic information about a person.
